examples: the most vocal and pertinacious of all the critics
a mind not gifted to discover truth but tenacious to hold it

definitions.text: harshly uninviting or formidable in manner or appearance; ; ; ; - J.M.Barrie
examples: a grim man loving duty more than humanity
undoubtedly the grimmest part of him was his iron claw

definitions.text: showing a brooding ill humor; ; ; ; ; ; - Bruce Bliven
examples: the proverbially dour New England Puritan
a saturnine, almost misanthropic young genius
